title.rendered: Accent Equity divests Oral Care Group AB to Axcel

content.rendered:
Accent Equity 2012 L.P. and minority shareholders have entered into an agreement to divest all of their shares in Oral Care Group AB to Axcel.

Oral Care is one of Sweden’s largest private care providers in dentistry. With approximately 375 employees and over 30 years of experience, Oral Care offers general and specialist dental care at clinic clinics and home dental care for elderly and/or sick patients in several county councils and regions.

Oral Care was founded in 1989 and is the largest player in the field of home dental care in Sweden. As of the beginning of 2020, Oral Care is also established in Norway.

The transaction is conditioned upon merger clearance and is expected to close during Q3 2022.

Accent is advised by Mannheimer Swartling in connection with the transaction.
